content.p: These pages offer veterinary students information about the opportunities open to you. After studying, many of you will be looking to start work in practice, but there are other options, too. Explore clinical pathways, finding work as a vet and other careers that use veterinary knowledge such as working in academia, charities, government, research and development, and sales. Explore clinical pathways for various disciplines Find out about other veterinarian career routes Information on where to look for jobs and how to be successful during the recruitment process Advice on your options if you want to look at alternative careers at the end of Year 3 Understand more about this varied career area, how to gain experience and where to look for jobs Discover this career area from what it involves and getting qualified to finding a job Explore your options for working abroad and hear about the experiences of our alumni Explore your options for supporting the care of animals in veterinary practices telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
